title: Market Conditions Could Hasten Crypto Bull Market Return: Arthur Hayes
description:

Hayes observed a quickly rising bear steepener that is proving difficult for the mainstream market to handle. He believes the fast-rising steepener would expose the mainstream markets and force the government to print more money […]
